TopicTitle: Kerbal Alarm Clock - reuse existing alarm if node within x(s)

Articles.Content: Does anybody know what this function does in KAC ? - reuse existing alarm if node within x(s) ? It's in Stettings -> Specifics _> Wrap to alarms. I can't understand what is it...

I've never used that feature of KAC, but I think it refers to a scenario where you have an alarm set for, sayh, 1h, 12m from now, and you make a new alarm that would be set for 1h, 12m, 10s from now. The alarms then might merge, because they are so close together in time, you wouldn't want to deal with two alarms going off within x amount of time.
